text:
e="preserve">Marvin Panch (May 28, 1926 – December 31, 2015) was a American stock car racing driver. Panch won the 1961 Daytona 500. He also won seventeen NASCAR Grand National - now Sprint Cup Series - events during a 17-year career. He was born in Menomonie, Wisconsin.
Panch died of natural causes after he was found in his car in Port Orange, Florida at the age of 89.
